price: لكه چې رب دې په حقه سره له كوره راووېستې او له مومنانو يوه ډله حتماً نا خوښه وه.
arabic: كَمَآ أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيۡتِكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: kamā akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-ḥaqi wa-inna farīqan mina al-mu'minīna lakārihūna
